review: Overall, the Fire TV Stick is a good product.  The picture (even on my 60" screen) and audio (I have a digital audio cable leading from my TV to my receiver) quality are in line with other streaming options.  However, the big downfall to this product is the ASAP delivery of your preferred content.  I was contacted by my provider about the dramatic increase in my bandwidth usage and was close to exceeding the monthly cap, which I wasn't truly aware of before, after only a WEEK of using the Stick at the end of November.  I work remote frequently, via a highly secured VPN, and have used multiple Apple TVs in the house for years without ever being close to the bandwidth cap.  Again... one week with the Stick and I was about to start shelling out for overage fees.  For the first part of December I just looked and was shocked to see it had already taken me to 25% of the cap for this month!  I don't even use the Stick daily!  Amazon needs to offer the option to turn off the ASAP delivery of content.  Maybe then I'd give this three or four stars....

review: Got it as an Amazon prime member and I think its great for the prime membership, however there is just one big problem.
